channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti tag on street light, 4th June
item.description:
Graffiti on street light on London Road.

item.title: Sign/waymarker is damaged problem, 4th June
item.description:
Style missing on boundary crossing near Black Barn. (see photo attached with no 1 marking missing style). GR 988316 Also no footpath signpost on gate (no 2 on photo). GR989315 Query re PROW at Mill Farm. GR033303. Is there PROW from the footpath to the minor adjacent road. Or is there no right of way pass gate boundary. Also noted that farmer at Mill Farm has put sign saying no dogs allowed on footpath. Is this correct?
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of dog poop near the pencil side of the wide element of the pavement. And further down same side of road by houses, 4th June
item.description:
Lots of dog poo outside the school side of the road and down by the houses. Residence purposely dont pick up their dog poo as they donâ€™t like parents dropping their kids off at the school next door so refuse to pick it up. More needs to be done, sign posts and fines for this. Its awful problem outside this school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree limbs about to fall and damage property and fall on people, 4th June
item.description:
Cul de sac lawrence close charlton kings for a couple of years but getting worse. The driveways have been recently done and the branches are falling everytime a refuse truck bangs into them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Lawrence Close, Cheltenham

item.title: Accident waiting to happen due to cars parking on blind corner, 3rd June
item.description:
Double yellow lines are needed on this stretch of road as it is a blind corner and when cars are parked on the one side of the road it is impossible to see oncoming traffic. Vehicles are travelling at a ridiculous speed down this road, far too fast considering they cannot see what is coming. A head on collision almost happened yesterday due to a car travelling too fast and there being cars parked on the one side!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Boverton Drive, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow Sign blocking view, 3rd June
item.description:
Hello Highways, I drove past this today and notice there is a yellow sign attached to official direction sign. The yellow sign blocks the view when at the junction. Please could something be done ablout this ? Sid Andersson
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malleson Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 3rd June
item.description:
Large tree seems to dangerous and limbs are falling off, yesterday one fell off onto the footway, luckily there was no one under it or vehicle. The branch has been moved but this tree needs assessing as it seems another branch will come of again imminently.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken manhole cover, 3rd June
item.description:
Manhole cover near telegraph pole causing damage to wheels/tyres. This road had previously been marked about a year ago, possibly for resurfacing(?), but still in bad state, & this damaged manhole is causing an issue for quite sometime.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
